name: The Language of Life
description:
[Update] A new version is available to play in the browser!

The jam version is still available as a downloadable file. I just wanted to thank everyone who said they would play more of my game, and I still had a lot of ideas. I hope you'll enjoy the new levels!

Developed by a one person team (me) for the Mini Jam 128, The Language of Life is a cute and colorful puzzle game that dives deep in what makes life possible.

In The Language of Life, you play as a cell from an unknown organism. You must assemble proteins from amino acids to overcome the challenges that you'll encounter during your cell life.

To do so, follow the instructions from your DNA to link the cute amino acids together in the right order! Unlock your cell's powers as you go and complete all the levels!

Level Design and Game Design: me

Art: me

Development: me

Music and sound effects: GameDev Market
